plot: Jim Wilson gets sore when, on the first of April, John Bunny, the bridge watchman, makes a fool of him. Bunny gets his silk hat and rubs it the wrong way when Wilson is not looking and then...
title: One Good Joke Deserves Another
plot_es: Jim Wilson gets sore when, on the first of April, John Bunny, the bridge watchman, makes a fool of him. Bunny gets his silk hat and rubs it the wrong way when Wilson is not looking and then...
plot_en: Jim Wilson gets sore when, on the first of April, John Bunny, the bridge watchman, makes a fool of him. Bunny gets his silk hat and rubs it the wrong way when Wilson is not looking and then...
